const getCategory=async()=>{const data=await axios.get('https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/categories.php');setCategory(data.data.categories);};useEffect(()=>{getCategory();},[]);const search=async word=>{if(word===""){getCategory();}else{const data=await axios.get(`https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/search.php?s=${word}`);setCategory(data.data.meals);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Suspense,{fallback:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoaderCategories,{}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HeaderPage,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{search:search}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CatigoriesListPage,{category:category})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/category/:categoryName",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MealsCat,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/category/meal/:mealId",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SingleMealDetailes,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/contact",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactPage,{})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}export default App;
